ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of BEVERLEY NOEL SALMON, C.M., O.Ont., of Toronto, Ontario, to be a special adviser to the Prime Minister, to serve as a member of the Independent Advisory Board for Supreme Court of Canada Judicial Appointments, to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year.
